fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value:
As your chest is imbued with the Christmas spirit, gain 1 **Happy** 😃 and 1 🛡️.
- While you have 🛡️, no one may **Peek** into your hand.

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:slightlylightergreenbutwithalitt:1120008660454744117> + <:pink:1106716301843497030> ):
fields.value:
As you become the Christmas spirit, gain 2 **Happy** 😃 and 2 🛡️.
- While you have 😃 or 🛡️, no one may **Peek** into your hand.
